text: <@U0TTWUHBK> you can try udacity advanced android course
they had a accessibility related chapter AFAIK

For image convert PSD to PNG or vector drawable
Or start coding to get the view :upside_down_face:

When adding the google services plugin. … I get dependency errors… can someone tell me what does the output acutally means?! ->
\--- com.google.firebase:firebase-core:9.0.0
     \--- com.google.firebase:firebase-analytics:9.0.0
          +--- com.google.android.gms:play-services-basement:9.0.0
          |    \--- com.android.support:support-v4:23.0.0
          |         \--- LOCAL: internal_impl-23.0.0.jar
          +--- com.google.firebase:firebase-common:9.0.0
          |    +--- com.google.android.gms:play-services-basement:9.0.0
Error:\--- com.android.support:support-v4:23.0.0
Error:\--- LOCAL: internal_impl-23.0.0.jar
just not sure what exactly the problem is

anyone can guide me related sharedprefrences in services for eg. i'm running service in my app and giving users some preferences like checkbox  as soon user select those checbox ...prefrences should change in running service ?
<@U0J3AKMPS> please do not crosspost. I have deleted your post in <#C04NZAN54|development>
<@U0J3AKMPS> you should implement OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener in your service <https://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener.html>
<@U061HDV96> yeah got it....now working great but is there any way as soon user select preference service stop and resume ?

<@U0J3AKMPS>: Sure, just implement the OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener in your PreferenceActivity / in your PreferenceFragment to be notified about  the change and then start the service with an intent (<https://developer.android.com/training/run-background-service/send-request.html>). You can add a bundle of extras to your intent to tell your service wether it should stop or do work.

attachments.title: Sending Work Requests to the Background Service | Android Developers
